page.title: 18RECREATION AT POYNTINGTON
page.content: Everyone has different views on {leisure pursuits.}A common denominator over this area might well be the enjoyment of one's garden and D.I.Y. handiwork,with TV and reading as favourite indoor pastimes.{Collecting stamps,postcards,shells,fossils,medals and coins or even old bottles is popular and family history research is another activity of growing attraction Leisure in the home can include {hospitality:}friends and relations from other parts of the country enjoy visting such a lovely area. Only a few people would belong to {sports}teams in nearby centres but more may take advantage of squash, swimming or badminton there.Youngsters engage in motocross.{Fox hunting}is well supported,especially by farming people.Locally there is game and rough shooting.
